content: this pattern is made with a zipper sewn up the back for ease in getting baby in and out before 6-26-2014 there is an error in the pattern row 8 under instructions for the body it lists the stitch count is 87 for the largest size it should be 83 a notice was sent out to anyone who downloaded the pattern on ravelry on 6-26-2014 5-2020 i added instructions for another size 2 years some people are a little confused about the hood and the direction to continue in this manner so here are some instructions to get you started row 1-4 k2 p2 rib row 5 k6 rib k6 row 6 p6 rib p6 row 7 k6 rib k6 row 8 k8 rib k8 row 9 p8 rib p8 row 10 k8 rib k8 row 11 k10 rib k10 row 12 p10 rib p10 row 13 k10 rib k10 row 14 k12 rib k12 row 15 p12 rib p12 row 16 k12 rib k12 row 17 k14 rib k14 row 18 p14 rib p14 row 19 k14 rib p14
